hover_help: Normal macOS sleep behavior is active.
Keeps your Mac awake while the lid is open.
Sleep is disabled system-wide until you turn this off.
Sleep is disabled outside this app. Toggle off to restore default behavior.
Prevents idle and display sleep while your Mac stays open.
Uses administrator permission to run: pmset -a disablesleep 1 or 0.
Launch AwakeBar automatically after you sign in.
Turns off Full Caffeine and Closed-Lid Mode.
